hero.title: Learn German with Sprichweg
hero.subtitle: Your path to fluent German speaking

beginner.title: Beginner Level (A1-A2)
beginner.description: Build a solid foundation in German with our beginner courses. Learn basic vocabulary, grammar, and everyday phrases.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Level (B1-B2)
intermediate.description: Expand your German skills with more complex grammar, conversational practice, and cultural insights.

advanced.title: Advanced Level (C1-C2)
advanced.description: Perfect your German with nuanced vocabulary, advanced grammar, and authentic discussions on complex topics.

about.title: About Sprichweg
about.description: Sprichweg is a premier German language school dedicated to helping students achieve fluency through immersive and engaging learning methods.
